description.plain: Bruce Fielder (born 1 November 1992), known professionally as Sigala, is an English DJ, record producer and remixer from Norwich, Norfolk. He is best known for his 2015 debut single “Easy Love”, which samples “ABC” by the Jackson 5. It debuted at number 71 on the UK Singles Chart on 4 September 2015 and jumped to number one the next week. His follow-up single, “Sweet Lovin'”, which features Bryn Christopher, reached number 3 in the UK Singles Chart. His next single “Say You Do”, which features Imani and DJ Fresh, was released on 18 March 2016 and reached number 5 in the UK Singles Chart.

body.plain: Bruce Fielder (born 1 November 1992), known professionally as Sigala, is an English DJ, record producer and remixer from Norwich, Norfolk. He is best known for his 2015 debut single “Easy Love”, which samples “ABC” by the Jackson 5. It debuted at number 71 on the UK Singles Chart on 4 September 2015 and jumped to number one the next week. His follow-up single, “Sweet Lovin'”, which features Bryn Christopher, reached number 3 in the UK Singles Chart. His next single “Say You Do”, which features Imani and DJ Fresh, was released on 18 March 2016 and reached number 5 in the UK Singles Chart.

songs.title: Easy Love

description.plain:
“Easy Love” is the debut single from London based musician, Bruce Fielder also known as Sigala. “Easy Love” peaked at number 1 in the UK, Australia, Belgium and Scotland.

Easy Love samples the 1970 single, “ABC” by the Jackson 5 and the chorus is sung by the legendary King of Pop himself, Michael Jackson at the tender age of 12! ABC peaked at number 1 on the US Billboard Hot 100
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ho7796-au8U

songs.embed_content: Read “Easy Love” by Sigala on Genius

songs.title: Sweet Lovin’

description.plain: Sweet Lovin' is the second single released by British producer Sigala with vocals by British singer-songwriter Bryn Christopher. The track was certified as Gold by the British Phonographic Industry.
